home.title: Millennia: Tracks of Time Solo Helper
home.play1: Play Millennia: Tracks of Time against Automa, the solo opponent.
home.play2: This application replaces the Automa cards, and guides you through the game flow. Additionally, it automates the tech card drafting and prosperity card selection.

setup.gameBoard: Setup the game the same way as a 2-player game.
setup.prosperityCards: You do not need to set up the prosperity cards, they are managed and displayed by the application.
setup.techCards: The tech cards and blank techs are randomized by the application, you are drafting them in the application against the Automa. After each drafting phase in the app, pick the cards your drafted from the stack of the corresponding age.
setup.playerColor: Choose a player color for the Automa. The Automa only needs 1 track marker and 1 VP marker.
setup.trackTokens: Place the Automa markers on the war track and on the VP track (starting with 0 VP).

startPlayer.player: You are the start player. Take 10 Gold. Take the first player token.
startPlayer.bot: Automa is the start player. Give it the first player token.

secondPlayer.player: You are the second player. Take 12 Gold. Take the architect token.
secondPlayer.bot: Automa is the second player. Give it the architect token.

botRules.intro: Differences between the Automa gameplay and a human player:
botRules.noGold: The Automa never has nor gains any gold.
botRules.noActions: The Automa does not perform any actions in the action phase;
botRules.onlyWarTrack: The Automa only advances on the war track and the VP track.
botRules.noVP: The Automa does not gain any VP except from the war track (by maxing out and by scoring at the end of the game).

phaseADrafting.title: A: Drafting
phaseADrafting.playerTurnSelect: Select a tech card, or use Next if you placed a marker on a special action.
phaseADrafting.botRound8Army: The Automa drafted the Army tech and gains 1 VP.

phaseDConstruction.title: D: Construction
phaseDConstruction.playerAction:
Buy a wonder or building and use Next.
Use Pass to end the construction phase.

phaseFWar.title: F: War
phaseFWar.advance: Automa advances {steps} steps on the war track.
phaseFWar.outmax: If the Automa maxes out the war track, it gains 3 VP per step beyond 7.
phaseFWar.resolve: Move the war track markers back an equal number of steps until the lowest marker returns to zero.
phaseFWar.resolveLastRound: Last Age: Do not move the war track markers.
